Key Match Events: Luka Doncic missing an open three in the final two minutes that would've put the Mavs up by five
Post-Match Reflections: The Dallas Mavericks fell to 5-4 with a 114-113 loss to the Phoenix Suns on Friday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas was missing Dereck Lively II in this game, but even when he's been on the floor, the Mavs have given up a lot of offensive rebounds
Others: The Mavericks could still use another shooter on this team if one becomes available for trade
